titleStmt.title: The two Lymas lovers, Thomas and Betty. Set forth in a dialogue between them at his departure ... Tune of, She so ungrateful a creature.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Gilt-spur-street,

notesStmt.note: Place and date range of publication from Wing.
Printed in black letter, in two columns.
Following title: "This may be printed. R.P."
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
